ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantItemListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantItemListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ClaimantItemListActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    This ClaimantItemListActivity class is an extended class of Activity class. This class controls the User Interface of ItemList for claimant. This view displays a list of Item, creates an option menu and have add a new item option. It associated with class FlagController.
    Version:
    04/07/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    Location, ArrayList, Bundle, Activity, AlertDialog, Intent, DialogInterface, DialogInterface.OnClickListener, Menu, MenuItem, View, AdapterView, ArrayAdapter, Toast, AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, ListView
